item.title: Deep Python learning with Tensorflow - a data-driven approach to Python execution
item.description:
Description

Is it possible to train a neural network to execute Python scripts?

Data-driven algorithm learning is a growing field of research. In this talk we will take a look at Googleâ€™s new deep learning library Tensorflow, and implement a basic model that can be taught how to execute simple Python scripts.
item.dc:creator: Erik Rehn
